sentences.en: By October 1990, when arrested, he was hopelessly in debt.
sentences.cn: 到1990年10月被捕时，他已经负债累累。

sentences.en: He was arrested last October still carrying a bloody knife.
sentences.cn: 去年10月他被捕时，身上还带着一把血迹斑斑的刀。

sentences.en: Most seasonal hiring is done in early October.
sentences.cn: 多数季节性招聘是在10月初进行。

sentences.en: My grandson has been away since last October.
sentences.cn: 我的孙子自去年10月份就离开了。

sentences.en: On 27 October they were bombed out.
sentences.cn: 在10月27号他们的家园被炸毁了。

sentences.en: Senior officials convened in October 1991 in London.
She is to retire as from 1 October.
She's having a baby in October.
The band have moved forward their Leeds date to October 27.
sentences.cn: 乐队已把去利兹的日期提前至10月27号。

sentences.en: The battle sputtered to a halt in mid-October.
sentences.cn: 战斗于10月中旬渐渐停了下来。

sentences.en: The chairman of the bench adjourned the case until October 27.
sentences.cn: 主审法官将案件延期到10月27日审理。

sentences.en: The club will convene in October.
The manufacturing economy contracted in October for the sixth consecutive month.
sentences.cn: 10月，制造业经济已经连续第6个月出现萎缩状况。

sentences.en: The meeting on 31 October is rearranged for 30 January.
sentences.cn: 10月31日的会议重新安排到了1月30日。

sentences.en: The shows kick off on October 24th.
They are scheduled for arraignment October 5th.
sentences.cn: 他们定于10月5号接受提审。

sentences.en: Three judges will deliver their verdict in October.

trans.tran_en: the tenth month of the year, between September and November
the tenth month of the year, between September and November
